name: BollyX
description: BollyX is perfect for anyone looking to dance to Bollywood music, get their heart rate up, and spread more joy in the world! BollyX is a Bollywood-inspired cardio dance-fitness program that combines dynamic choreography with music from around the world.
fullDescription: BollyX is perfect for anyone looking to dance to Bollywood music, get their heart rate up, and spread more joy in the world! BollyX is a Bollywood-inspired cardio dance-fitness program that combines dynamic choreography with music from around the world.
whatTheyOffer: BollyX is perfect for anyone looking to dance to Bollywood music, get their heart rate up, and spread more joy in the world! BollyX is a Bollywood-inspired cardio dance-fitness program that combines dynamic choreography with music from around the world.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
agency: Harvey Milk Center for the Arts
